trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 처리 하는 메서드를 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: 처리 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>이벤트 처리기에서 지정 하는 바로 가기 메뉴가 표시 됩니다는 셀을 클릭할 때마다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to display shortcut menus determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 현재 상태 또는 셀의 값에 의해 결정 되는 바로 가기 메뉴를 표시 하려는 경우에 유용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>이벤트는 또한 될 때마다 발생의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>검색 하거나 프로그래밍 방식으로 또는 셀을 클릭할 때.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>상태 또는 셀의 값을 확인 하 고이 정보를 사용 하 여 설정할 속성을는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 셀의 값으로 초기화 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>이벤트 값을 무시 하는 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>많은 양의 데이터로 작업할 때 이벤트 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>여러 셀에 대 한 값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 크기 조정에 대 한 유용한](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: 행을 설정 하 여 개별 셀 대신 개별 행에 대 한 바로 가기 메뉴를 지정할 수도 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>속성 또는 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 셀 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>속성 설정은 행 보다 우선 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>속성 설정 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>이벤트 모두 재정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>이벤트와 행 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>속성을 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 지정할 수 있습니다 `null` 셀 바로 가기 메뉴를에 대 한 행 바로 가기 메뉴에서 재정의 되지 않도록 하려면.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 사용](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)합니다.

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventHandler 대리자를 만들 때 이벤트를 처리 하는 메서드를 식별 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 이벤트 처리기를 연결 하려면 대리자의 인스턴스 이벤트에 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 대리자를 제거 하지 않으면 이벤트가 발생할 때마다 이벤트 처리기가 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 처리기 대리자에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 및 대리자](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)합니다.
